Find a Sarku Japan Near You

Looking for fresh, made-to-order Japanese food nearby? Use our Sarku Japan store locator to find the closest restaurant to you. With more than 170 locations across 34 states, plus over 30 in Colombia, Sarku Japan has become the go-to spot for quick, fresh and flavorful meals prepared right in front of our guests. Whether you‚Äôre searching ‚ÄúSarku Japan near me‚Äù or planning a visit to a mall or shopping center, chances are there‚Äôs a location not too far away.

Each restaurant offers our signature Chicken Teriyaki, cooked hot off the grill with fresh vegetables, rice or noodle, and our famous Teriyaki sauce. We also offer Beef and Shrimp Teriyaki, Sushi and Bento Boxes. From busy food courts in California and Florida to standalone street locations in New York and Cleveland and military bases across the U.S., our stores are designed to bring the energy and flavor of teppanyaki cooking to your neighborhood.

Finding a Sarku Japan address is simple. Just enter your city, ZIP code, or address in the search box above and browse through available options. The locator makes it easy to discover exact store details, from street addresses to operating hours, so you can pick the most convenient restaurant for dine-in, takeout, or online ordering.

Since opening the very first store in Boston back in 1987, Sarku Japan has continued to grow while staying true to its Kaizen philosophy of continuous improvement. No matter which location you visit, you can expect the same dedication to quality ingredients, freshly grilled meals, and friendly service that has made us a favorite for millions of customers.

[Page Title: Teriyaki Menu ‚Äì Chicken, Beef & Shrimp | Sarku Japan]

Chicken Teriyaki
What we‚Äôre famous for! Our tender chicken is marinated in-house daily, then cooked to order on the griddle, topped with our signature teriyaki sauce and served with rice and a medley of vegetables. 640 Calories 24g Fat 870mg Sodium 28g Protein 79g Carbs 
Beef Teriyaki
Tender all American beef cooked on the griddle to order, topped with our signature teriyaki sauce and served with rice and a medley of vegetables. 580 Calories 16g Fat 1220mg Sodium 30g Protein 80g Carbs 
Shrimp Teriyaki
Succulent shrimp cooked to order on the griddle, topped with our signature teriyaki sauce and served with rice and a medley of vegetables. 530 Calories 12g Fat 1200mg Sodium 27g Protein 80g Carbs 
Chicken & Shrimp Teriyaki
Can‚Äôt decide? Get a mixture of our most popular chicken and shrimp mixed with a medley of vegetables and our signature teriyaki sauce. 750 Calories 29g Fat 1450mg Sodium 40g Protein 85g Carbs 
Beef & Shrimp Teriyaki
The best of both worlds! Our beef and shrimp teriyaki with a medley of vegetables, served over rice with our famous teriyaki sauce . 690 Calories 21g Fat 1800mg Sodium 41g Protein 85g Carbs 
Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
A smaller portion of our signature Chicken Teriyaki served in a bowl over rice and a medley of vegetables. 430 Calories 16g Fat 580mg Sodium 19g Protein 53g Carbs

Exclusive Member Limited Time Offer! Every Thursday for the rest of January, double down on amazing flavor with our BOGO $2.99 Chicken Teriyaki Entr√©e Special! It doesn't matter if you‚Äôre sharing with a friend or enjoying two times the teriyaki for yourself; make sure you don't miss
... out on this delicious deal. This promotion is only on the Sarku Japan App and Online Ordering. 
 
 How to get yours? 
 1. Open the Sarku Japan App and login to your account 
 2. Navigate to our menu 
 3. Select 'Specials' in our Exclusive Members' menu 
 4. Add the BOGO $2.99 Chicken Teriyaki to your cart (You will have to add the first one to the cart, then a prompt will appear for the second Chicken Teriyaki for $2.99) 
 
 *Must purchase a regular-priced Chicken Teriyaki Entr√©e to redeem the second Chicken Teriyaki Entr√©e for $2.99 (+ tax). Available ONLY on Sarku Japan App and Online Ordering at participating locations. Add-ons available at an additional cost. Valid only on Jan 8, 15, 22, and 29, 2026.
